title.en: Guild Tsuihousareta Zatsuyou-gakari no Gekokujou ~Chou Bannou na Seikatsu Skill de Sekai Saikyou~

altTitles.ja: ギルド追放された雑用係の下剋上～超万能な生活スキルで世界最強～

altTitles.en: The Rise of the Errand Boy Who Was Kicked Out of the Guild ~World's Strongest with Ultra-Versatile Living Skills~

description.en: The polished errand skills are a cheat technique that freely manipulates even space...!? Tim, a boy serving as an errand runner at a huge adventurer's guild, had been stuck at the beginner rank for three years and was subjected to insidious bullying. One day, his fate begins to dramatically change after being summoned by the guild leader, Gilnelise, as Tim, who had zero talent in both swordsmanship and magic, starts to turn his luck around...! Although he was framed and expelled from the guild, the beautiful guild leader who believes in him ends up following him for some reason. However, Tim had hidden talents that even she finds surprising...!! The grand opening of a kind-hearted boy's unaware and unmatched fantasy!
description.ja: 磨き抜かれた雑用スキルは、空間をも自在に操るチート技…!?　巨大冒険者ギルドで雑用係を務める少年ティムは、3年経ってもビギナーランクから上がれず、陰湿なイジメに遭っていた。ある日、ギルド長ギルネリーゼから呼び出しを受けたことから、剣も魔法も才能ゼロだったティムの運命は、大きく転がり始める…！　冤罪をかけられてギルドから追放されたものの、彼を信じる美少女ギルド長がなぜかついてきてしまう。しかしティムは、彼女も驚くほどの才能を秘めていた…!!　心優しき少年の無自覚無双ファンタジー、堂々の開幕!!
